title: George Clooney Surprises a Very Lucky Lady on Her 87th Birthday
text:
George Clooney Surprising Elderly Fan in England March 2017 George Clooney Surprises a Very Lucky Lady on Her 87th Birthday March 20, 2017 
â€” Malcolm Hague (@MalcolmHague) March 19, 2017 
George Clooney has long been one of the most charming men in Hollywood, but he recently brought his magnetism to Southbourne, England to visit a very special fan. George stopped by the Sunrise Senior Living Facility to wish one of the residents, Pat Adams, a happy 87th birthday. By the looks of the photo that Sunrise shared on Twitter on Monday, Pat was not only surprised but absolutely delighted by the gesture. 
According to People , the facility is near the home that George shares with his wife Amal . "The lady in the picture loves George Clooney and mentions every day how she would love him to meet him, especially as he lives so near to where I work," staff member Linda Jones posted to her Facebook page . "So letters have been sent asking would it be possible for her dream to come true. He brought a card and a lovely bunch of flowers" The staff member explained that the Money Monster star popped by during her shift and that she was in "utter shock" when she answered the door to find him behind it. "He bought a card and a lovely bunch of flowers. [It] seems hard to believe now that he actually came in," she said. 
George's sweet deed is similar to one made by fellow Hollywood veteran Denzel Washington, who paid a visit to his childhood librarian, Connie Mauro , on her 99th birthday. What amazing guys, right? Image Source: Sunrise Senior Living UK
